sentences.translation: 警察在设有路障的地方堵住了恐怖分子。

families: trapped 捕获的；陷入困境的；收集的；受到限制的
trapper 设陷阱捕兽者；捕捉器；[矿业] 矿井风门开关管理员
trapping 诱捕（trap的ing形式）；设陷阱；阻止；使密封于管内

N: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

sentences.content: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.translation: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.content: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.translation: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.content: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.translation: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.content: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.translation: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.content: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.translation: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.content: national and international economic trends
sentences.translation: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.content: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.translation: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.content: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.translation: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

memory: tend(倾向)加r还是倾向(trend)

N: a device that activates or releases or causes something to happen
lever that activates the firing mechanism of a gun
an act that sets in motion some course of events
V: put in motion or move to act
release or pull the trigger on

N: （尤指引发不良反应或发展的）起因，诱因

sentences.content: The assassination triggered off a wave of rioting.
sentences.translation: 这次暗杀事件引发了一阵骚乱。

sentences.content: Certain forms of mental illness can be triggered by food allergies.
sentences.translation: 某些精神疾病可能由食物过敏引发。

sentences.content: His action triggered a massive response from the government.
sentences.translation: 他的行动引发了政府的巨大反应。

sentences.content: A man pointed a gun at them and pulled the trigger.
sentences.translation: 一个男人用枪指着他们，扣动了扳机。

memory: 扣动扳机(trigger)射杀了一只老虎(tiger)

ADJ: coming from or existing in the hottest parts of the world

sentences.content: the tropical rain forests
sentences.translation: 热带雨林

sentences.content: tropical fruit
sentences.translation: 热带水果

N: (尤指对个人或小组的)教学，讲授，指导

sentences.content: I had to have extra tuition in maths.
sentences.translation: 我不得不上数学补习课。

N: a political or emotional situation that is very confused

sentences.content: A period of political turbulence followed the civil war.
sentences.translation: 内战结束之后紧接着的是一段政治动荡时期。

N: a  reptile  that lives mainly in water and has a soft body covered by a hard shell

sentences.content: ...a pet turtle.
sentences.translation: …一只宠物龟。
